## Ëá™Âä®ÂåñÊ±ÇËÅåÂä©ÊâãÔºàLinkedIn + IndeedÔºâÔºöÈÄöËøáÈÇÆ‰ª∂Ëé∑ÂèñÊúÄ‰Ω≥ËÅå‰ΩçÂåπÈÖç + ÁîüÊàêÊ±ÇËÅå‰ø° + ‰øùÂ≠òÂà∞Notion

**‰ΩúËÄÖ**: Wen
**EmailÂú∞ÂùÄ**: wenjiaqi8255@outlook.com

**ÊèèËø∞**: 
Ê≠§n8nÂ∑•‰ΩúÊµÅÁ®ãÊó®Âú®Ëá™Âä®ÂåñÂØªÊâæÂíåÊé®ÈÄÅÊúÄ‰Ω≥ËÅå‰ΩçÊé®ËçêÁöÑËøáÁ®ã„ÄÇÂÆÉ‰ºöËé∑ÂèñÊÇ®ÁöÑÁÆÄÂéÜÔºå‰ªéLinkedInÂíåIndeedÊäìÂèñËÅå‰ΩçÂàóË°®Ôºå‰ΩøÁî®AIÔºàGoogle GeminiÔºâÂ∞ÜËÅå‰Ωç‰∏éÊÇ®ÁöÑÁÆÄÂéÜËøõË°åÂåπÈÖçÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÈÄöËøáÁîµÂ≠êÈÇÆ‰ª∂ÂèëÈÄÅÊúÄ‰Ω≥ËÅå‰ΩçÊé®ËçêÁªôÊÇ®„ÄÇËØ•Â∑•‰ΩúÊµÅÁ®ãÊåâËÆ°ÂàíËá™Âä®ËøêË°å„ÄÇ

**Ê†∏ÂøÉÂäüËÉΩ**:
- ÁÆÄÂéÜ‰∏éËÅå‰ΩçËá™Âä®ÂåπÈÖç
- ‰∏™ÊÄßÂåñÊ±ÇËÅå‰ø°ÁîüÊàê
- ÂÆöÊó∂ÈÇÆ‰ª∂Êé®ÈÄÅÈ´òÂåπÈÖçÂ∫¶ËÅå‰Ωç

parameters.text:
=You are an expert AI assistant specializing in career matching and job recommendation.

Your Goal:
Your primary task is to analyze a provided dataset of 100 LinkedIn job descriptions , a user's Curriculum Vitae (CV) provided as a string, and the user's job preferences is also provided as a string. Based on this analysis, you must identify and select the top 5 most suitable job opportunities for the user from the provided list.

Inputs You Will Receive:

job_descriptions {{ $('stringify_json').item.json.stringified }}: A collection containing 100 job descriptions scraped from LinkedIn. Each job has the following structure:
{
  "id": [database ID],
  "company_name": [company name],
  "job_title": [job title],
  "industry": [industry],
  "application_url": [URL],
  "location": [job location],
  "flexibility": [work arrangement],
  "salary_range": [salary if available],
  "created_at": [timestamp]
}
user_cv {{ $('SetResumeField').first().json.Resume }}: A single string containing the user's full CV text.
user_preferences {{ $('Input').first().json.Preference }}: A single string outlining the user's job preferences (e.g., desired roles, industries, company size, location constraints, salary expectations, work culture).

Your Task Breakdown:

Analyze: Meticulously parse and understand the content of the user_cv and user_preferences.
Evaluate: For each of the 100 job_descriptions:
Extract key information: Company Name, Job Title, Industry (if explicitly mentioned or inferable), and Application URL.
Compare the job's requirements, responsibilities, and company details against the user's skills, experience (from user_cv), and stated desires (from user_preferences).
Rank: Assess the suitability of each job for the user based on the comparison. Create a ranked list of all 100 jobs from most to least suitable.
Select: Choose the top {{ $('Input').first().json.RecommendedJobCount || 8 }} from your ranked list.
Format Output: Prepare the final output containing detailed information for only these 8 selected jobs.

Output Requirements:

You must return a structured list containing exactly 8 job recommendations. For each of the 8 jobs, provide the following specific details:

database_id: The "id" field from the job record.
Company Name: The name of the hiring company from "company_name".
Job Title: The official title of the position from "job_title".
Industry: The industry sector from "industry" (if available).
Reason for Match: A brief (1-2 sentences) explanation justifying why this specific job is a strong match for the user. This explanation should explicitly reference alignment between the user's CV/preferences and the job description.
Application URL: The direct URL to apply from "application_url". If the apply URL is not found or empty, return the linkedin link for this job.
Location: The job location from "location".
Flexibility: Work arrangement type from "flexibility".
Salary Range: Salary information from "salary_range" if available, otherwise "Not specified".

Output format Example:
[
  {
    "database_id": 1,
    "Company Name": "Innovatech Solutions",
    "Job Title": "Senior Software Engineer",
    "Industry": "Technology / SaaS",
    "Reason for Match": "Strong alignment with your 7 years of backend development experience (Java/Spring) listed in CV and your preference for mid-sized tech companies.",
    "Application URL": "https://linkedin.com/jobs/view/1234567890",
    "Location": "San Francisco, CA",
    "Flexibility": "Hybrid",
    "Salary Range": "$120,000 - $150,000"
  },
  {
    "database_id": 2,
    "Company Name": "FinSecure Corp",
    "Job Title": "Data Scientist",
    "Industry": "Financial Services",
    "Reason for Match": "Matches your PhD in Statistics, experience with machine learning models detailed in your CV, and stated interest in the Fintech sector.",
    "Application URL": "https://linkedin.com/jobs/view/0987654321",
    "Location": "New York, NY",
    "Flexibility": "On-site",
    "Salary Range": "$110,000 - $130,000"
  },
  {
    "database_id": 3,
    "Company Name": "Global Health Initiative",
    "Job Title": "Biostatistician",
    "Industry": "Healthcare / Research",
    "Reason for Match": "Aligns with your strong statistical background and published research in healthcare outcomes mentioned in your CV.",
    "Application URL": "https://linkedin.com/jobs/view/5678901234",
    "Location": "Boston, MA",
    "Flexibility": "Hybrid",
    "Salary Range": "Not specified"
  },
  {
    "database_id": 4,
    "Company Name": "EcoSolutions",
    "Job Title": "Sustainability Analyst",
    "Industry": "Environmental Services",
    "Reason for Match": "Matches your environmental science background and stated preference for working in sustainability-focused organizations.",
    "Application URL": "https://linkedin.com/jobs/view/2345678901",
    "Location": "Portland, OR",
    "Flexibility": "Remote",
    "Salary Range": "$85,000 - $95,000"
  },
  {
    "database_id": 5,
    "Company Name": "TechStart Accelerator",
    "Job Title": "Technology Consultant",
    "Industry": "Consulting",
    "Reason for Match": "Aligns with your technical advisory experience and preference for varied project work mentioned in your preferences.",
    "Application URL": "https://linkedin.com/jobs/view/3456789012",
    "Location": "Austin, TX",
    "Flexibility": "Hybrid",
    "Salary Range": "$100,000 - $120,000"
  },
  {
    "database_id": 6,
    "Company Name": "TechStart Accelerator",
    "Job Title": "Technology Consultant",
    "Industry": "Consulting",
    "Reason for Match": "Aligns with your technical advisory experience and preference for varied project work mentioned in your preferences.",
    "Application URL": "https://linkedin.com/jobs/view/3456789012",
    "Location": "Austin, TX",
    "Flexibility": "Hybrid",
    "Salary Range": "$100,000 - $120,000"
  },
  {
    "database_id": 7,
    "Company Name": "TechStart Accelerator",
    "Job Title": "Technology Consultant",
    "Industry": "Consulting",
    "Reason for Match": "Aligns with your technical advisory experience and preference for varied project work mentioned in your preferences.",
    "Application URL": "https://linkedin.com/jobs/view/3456789012",
    "Location": "Austin, TX",
    "Flexibility": "Hybrid",
    "Salary Range": "$100,000 - $120,000"
  },
  {
    "database_id": 8,
    "Company Name": "TechStart Accelerator",
    "Job Title": "Technology Consultant",
    "Industry": "Consulting",
    "Reason for Match": "Aligns with your technical advisory experience and preference for varied project work mentioned in your preferences.",
    "Application URL": "https://linkedin.com/jobs/view/3456789012",

    "Salary Range": "$100,000 - $120,000"
  }

### Input
**ÂÖ≥ÈîÆÈÖçÁΩÆËäÇÁÇπ**
ËøôÈáåËÆæÁΩÆ‰∫ÜÊï¥‰∏™Â∑•‰ΩúÊµÅÁ®ã‰∏≠‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑÈáçË¶ÅÂèòÈáèÔºö
- **ApifyAPIKey**: Áî®‰∫éËÆøÈóÆApifyÊúçÂä°ÁöÑAPIÂØÜÈí•
- **Preference**: ÊÇ®ÁöÑÊ±ÇËÅåÂÅèÂ•ΩÔºåÂΩ±ÂìçAIÂåπÈÖçÁªìÊûú
- **EmailAddressToReceiveJobRecommendations**: Êé•Êî∂ËÅå‰ΩçÊé®ËçêÁöÑÈÇÆÁÆ±
- **recommendedJobCount**: ÊØèÊ¨°Êé®ËçêÁöÑËÅå‰ΩçÊï∞Èáè
- **first_timeout**: È¶ñÊ¨°APIËØ∑Ê±ÇË∂ÖÊó∂Êó∂Èó¥ÔºàÁßíÔºâ
- **request_interval**: ÈáçËØïËØ∑Ê±ÇÈó¥ÈöîÊó∂Èó¥ÔºàÁßíÔºâ

### DownloadResume
‰ªéGoogle Drive‰∏ãËΩΩÊÇ®ÁöÑÁÆÄÂéÜPDFÊñá‰ª∂„ÄÇËØ∑Á°Æ‰øù‰∏ä‰º†ÊÇ®ÁöÑÁÆÄÂéÜÂà∞Google DriveÂπ∂Ëé∑ÂèñÊñá‰ª∂ID„ÄÇ

### Extract Information from Resume PDF
ÊèêÂèñÁÆÄÂéÜPDF‰∏≠ÁöÑÊñáÊú¨ÂÜÖÂÆπÔºå‰∏∫ÂêéÁª≠AIÂåπÈÖçÂÅöÂáÜÂ§á„ÄÇ

### SetResumeField
Â∞ÜÊèêÂèñÁöÑÁÆÄÂéÜÊñáÊú¨ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÂèòÈáèÔºå‰ª•‰æøÂú®Â∑•‰ΩúÊµÅÁ®ãÁöÑÂêéÁª≠Ê≠•È™§‰∏≠‰ΩøÁî®„ÄÇ

### start_apify_run_linkedin
ÂêØÂä®ApifyÁà¨Ëô´ÔºåÊäìÂèñLinkedIn‰∏äÁöÑËÅå‰Ωç‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ
Á°Æ‰øùÂú®jsonBody‰∏≠ËÆæÁΩÆÊ≠£Á°ÆÁöÑÊêúÁ¥¢URLÂíåÂèÇÊï∞„ÄÇ

### Check Run Status / Get Dataset Items
Ëøô‰∫õËäÇÁÇπÊ£ÄÊü•Áà¨Ëô´ËøêË°åÁä∂ÊÄÅÂπ∂Ëé∑ÂèñÁªìÊûúÊï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇ
ÂåÖÂê´ÈîôËØØÂ§ÑÁêÜÂíåÈáçËØïÊú∫Âà∂ÔºåÁ°Æ‰øùÂèØÈù†Ëé∑ÂèñËÅå‰Ωç‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ

### AI Agent: Find Best-matched jobs
**Ê†∏ÂøÉÂåπÈÖçËäÇÁÇπ**

**ËæìÂÖ•**:
- **scraped_job_data**: ‰ªéLinkedInÂíåIndeedÊäìÂèñÁöÑÊâÄÊúâËÅå‰Ωç‰ø°ÊÅØ
- **user_cv**: Áî®Êà∑ÁÆÄÂéÜÊñáÊú¨Ôºà‰ªéPDFÊèêÂèñÔºâ
- **user_preferences**: Áî®Êà∑ÁöÑÊ±ÇËÅåÂÅèÂ•ΩËÆæÁΩÆÔºàÂ¶ÇÂú∞ÁÇπ„ÄÅË°å‰∏ö„ÄÅËñ™ËµÑÊúüÊúõÁ≠âÔºâ
- **recommendedJobCount**: ÈúÄË¶ÅÂåπÈÖçÁöÑËÅå‰ΩçÊï∞Èáè

**ËæìÂá∫**:
ÁªìÊûÑÂåñÂàóË°®ÔºåÂåÖÂê´Êé®ËçêËÅå‰ΩçÁöÑËØ¶ÁªÜ‰ø°ÊÅØÔºö
- **database_id**: ËÅå‰ΩçËÆ∞ÂΩïID
- **Company Name**: ÊãõËÅòÂÖ¨Âè∏ÂêçÁß∞
- **Job Title**: ËÅå‰ΩçÂêçÁß∞
- **Industry**: Ë°å‰∏öÈ¢ÜÂüü
- **Reason for Match**: ÂåπÈÖçÂéüÂõ†ËØ¥ÊòéÔºà1-2Âè•ËØùËØ¥Êòé‰∏∫‰ΩïÊ≠§ËÅå‰Ωç‰∏éÁî®Êà∑ÂåπÈÖçÔºâ
- **Application URL**: Áî≥ËØ∑ÈìæÊé•
- **Location**: Â∑•‰ΩúÂú∞ÁÇπ
- **Flexibility**: Â∑•‰ΩúÂÆâÊéíÊñπÂºèÔºàËøúÁ®ã„ÄÅÊ∑∑Âêà„ÄÅÁé∞Âú∫Á≠âÔºâ
- **Salary Range**: Ëñ™ËµÑËåÉÂõ¥ÔºàÂ¶ÇÊúâÔºâ

## Â∑•‰ΩúÊµÅÁ®ãËÆæÁΩÆÊåáÂçó
### ËØ∑ÊåâÁÖß‰ª•‰∏ãÊ≠•È™§ËÆæÁΩÆÂ∑•‰ΩúÊµÅÁ®ãÔºö

### 1. ÈÖçÁΩÆËæìÂÖ•ËäÇÁÇπÔºö
ÊâìÂºÄÂ∑•‰ΩúÊµÅ‰∏≠ÁöÑ"Input"ËäÇÁÇπ„ÄÇ
Â°´ÂÜôÂøÖÂ°´Â≠óÊÆµÔºö
- **ApifyAPIKey**: ËæìÂÖ•ÊÇ®ÁöÑApify APIÂØÜÈí•ÔºàÁôªÂΩïApify: https://www.apify.com?fpr=oljm1 -> ËÆæÁΩÆ -> API & IntegrationÔºâ
- **Preference**: ÊåáÂÆöÊÇ®ÁöÑÊ±ÇËÅåÂÅèÂ•ΩÔºàÂ¶Ç"Êó†Âæ∑ËØ≠Ë¶ÅÊ±ÇÔºåÈ´òËñ™"Ôºâ
- **EmailAddressToReceiveJobRecommendations**: Êèê‰æõÊÇ®Â∏åÊúõÊé•Êî∂ËÅå‰ΩçÊé®ËçêÁöÑÁîµÂ≠êÈÇÆ‰ª∂Âú∞ÂùÄ
- **recommendedJobCount**: ËÆæÁΩÆÊØèÊ¨°Êé®ËçêÁöÑËÅå‰ΩçÊï∞ÈáèÔºàÈªòËÆ§‰∏∫10Ôºâ

### 2. ÈÖçÁΩÆLinkedInËÅå‰ΩçÊêúÁ¥¢URLÔºö

- Âú®ÊµèËßàÂô®ÁöÑÈöêÁßÅ/Êó†ÁóïÁ™óÂè£‰∏≠ÊâìÂºÄLinkedIn JobsÊêúÁ¥¢È°µÈù¢Ôºöhttps://www.linkedin.com/jobs/search/
- ‰ΩøÁî®LinkedInÊêúÁ¥¢ÁïåÈù¢ËÆæÁΩÆÊÇ®ÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑÁ≠õÈÄâÊù°‰ª∂ÔºàÂÖ≥ÈîÆËØç„ÄÅÂú∞ÁÇπ„ÄÅÁªèÈ™åÊ∞¥Âπ≥Á≠âÔºâ„ÄÇ**Âä°ÂøÖÊ∑ªÂä†"ËøáÂéª24Â∞èÊó∂"Á≠õÈÄâÊù°‰ª∂**
- Â§çÂà∂ÊµèËßàÂô®Âú∞ÂùÄÊ†è‰∏≠ÁöÑÂÆåÊï¥URL
- ÊâìÂºÄÂ∑•‰ΩúÊµÅ‰∏≠ÁöÑ"start_apify_run_linkedin"ËäÇÁÇπ
- Âú®"jsonBody"ÂèÇÊï∞‰∏≠ÊâæÂà∞"urls"Êï∞ÁªÑÔºö
  ```json
  "urls": [
      "https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/search/..."
  ]

Â∞ÜÁé∞ÊúâURLÔºà"https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/search/..."ÔºâÊõøÊç¢‰∏∫ÊÇ®‰ªéÈöêÁßÅÁ™óÂè£Â§çÂà∂ÁöÑÂÆåÊï¥URL„ÄÇÁ°Æ‰øùURLÁî®ÂèåÂºïÂè∑Êã¨Ëµ∑Êù•

3. ÈÖçÁΩÆIndeedËÅå‰ΩçÊêúÁ¥¢ÔºàÂèØÈÄâÔºâÔºö

Á±ª‰ººÂú∞ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Âú®"start_apify_run_indeed"ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏≠ÈÖçÁΩÆIndeedÊêúÁ¥¢ÂèÇÊï∞
Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊêúÁ¥¢ÂÖ≥ÈîÆËØç„ÄÅÂú∞ÁÇπÂíåÂÖ∂‰ªñÂèÇÊï∞‰ª•Á¨¶ÂêàÊÇ®ÁöÑÊ±ÇËÅåÈúÄÊ±Ç

4. ‰∏ä‰º†ÊÇ®ÁöÑÁÆÄÂéÜÔºö

Â∞ÜÊÇ®ÁöÑÁÆÄÂéÜÔºàPDFÊ†ºÂºèÔºâ‰∏ä‰º†Âà∞Google Drive
Âú®"DownloadResume"ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏≠Êõ¥Êñ∞Êñá‰ª∂ID‰ª•ÊåáÂêëÊÇ®ÁöÑÁÆÄÂéÜ

parameters.text:
=# Cover Letter Assistant

You are a professional cover letter consultant who creates authentic, targeted, and personalized cover letters. Your task is to create an effective cover letter based on a job description and resume.

## Basic Information

Position: {{ $('Supabase_get').item.json.job_title }}
Company: {{ $('Supabase_get').item.json.company_name }}
Industry: {{ $('Supabase_get').item.json.industry }}
Location: {{ $('Supabase_get').item.json.location }}

Job Description: {{ $('Supabase_get').item.json.description }}
Resume Content: {{ $json.text }}

## Cover Letter Guidelines

### Core Principles

1. **Company-needs focused**: Start with "how my skills solve this company's specific problems" rather than simply listing personal achievements
2. **Concise and direct**: Use clear, short sentences; avoid complex structures and decorative vocabulary
3. **Authentic personality**: Show the applicant's genuine work style and personality, avoid clich√©s
4. **Targeted approach**: Address key requirements from the job description directly, not vaguely
5. **Quality over quantity**: Prefer a few powerful examples rather than many vague accomplishments

### Structure Suggestions

**Opening paragraph**:
- Briefly express why you're interested in this position
- Mention a specific company project, value, or challenge, showing your research
- Keep within 2-3 short sentences

**Skills matching paragraphs**:
- Focus each paragraph on one core skill or company need
- State the company's need first, then introduce your relevant experience
- Provide 1-2 specific examples, using data only when actually supported
- Keep each paragraph to 3-4 short sentences

**Unique value paragraph**:
- Include a paragraph showcasing your unique advantage
- This could be a relevant side project, special skill, or personal work approach
- Show how this unique value benefits the company

**Closing paragraph**:
- Simply express your interest in further discussion
- Consider mentioning your personal website or portfolio
- Keep it brief, 2-3 sentences is enough

### Language Style Guide

- Use active language, avoid passive voice
- Avoid clich√©s like "I am excited to apply..." or "I believe I am the best candidate..."
- Adjust tone for company culture: technical companies use precise terminology, creative companies emphasize innovative thinking, etc.
- Use natural, conversational language, as if talking with the hiring manager

### Common Mistakes to Avoid

- Overusing industry jargon and abbreviations
- Long paragraphs and complex sentences
- Data claims without supporting context
- Vague achievement descriptions
- Too much focus on "what I did" rather than "what I can do for you"

## Final Check

Before finalizing, ensure the cover letter:
- Totals 300-400 words (not exceeding one page)
- Uses no templated expressions or business clich√©s
- Addresses all key requirements from the job description
- Has a clear focus and natural transitions in each paragraph
- Shows the applicant's personality and work style
- Is oriented toward solving company problems

Please create a cover letter following these guidelines, keeping it authentic, concise, and targeted.

parameters.content:
### start_apify_run_indeed
ÂêØÂä®ApifyÁà¨Ëô´ÔºåÊäìÂèñLinkedIn‰∏äÁöÑËÅå‰Ωç‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ
Á°Æ‰øùÂú®jsonBody‰∏≠ËÆæÁΩÆÊ≠£Á°ÆÁöÑÊêúÁ¥¢URLÂíåÂèÇÊï∞„ÄÇ

### Check Run Status / Get Dataset Items
Ëøô‰∫õËäÇÁÇπÊ£ÄÊü•Áà¨Ëô´ËøêË°åÁä∂ÊÄÅÂπ∂Ëé∑ÂèñÁªìÊûúÊï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇ
ÂåÖÂê´ÈîôËØØÂ§ÑÁêÜÂíåÈáçËØïÊú∫Âà∂ÔºåÁ°Æ‰øùÂèØÈù†Ëé∑ÂèñËÅå‰Ωç‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ

5. ÈÖçÁΩÆNotionÈõÜÊàêÔºàÂèØÈÄâÔºâÔºö

Â¶ÇÈúÄ‰ΩøÁî®NotionË∑üË∏™Â∫îÁî®ËøõÂ∫¶ÔºåËØ∑Á°Æ‰øùËÆæÁΩÆ‰∫ÜÊ≠£Á°ÆÁöÑNotion Database ID
Ê≥®ÔºöÂª∫ËÆÆÂàõÂª∫‰∏§‰∏™Êï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ìÔºö

Job TrackerÊï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì
Â±ûÊÄßÔºöCompany Name(Ê†áÈ¢ò), Job Title, Industry, Application URL, Location, Flexibility, Salary Range, Status


Cover LetterÊï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì
Â±ûÊÄßÔºöTitle(Ê†áÈ¢ò), Company Name

6. Êï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ìÈÖçÁΩÆÔºö

Á°Æ‰øùÂú®SupabaseÊàñÊÇ®ÈÄâÊã©ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ìÁ≥ªÁªü‰∏≠ÂàõÂª∫‰∫ÜÂêç‰∏∫job_listingsÁöÑË°®
Ë°®ÁªìÊûÑÂ∫îÂåÖÂê´‰ª•‰∏ãÂ≠óÊÆµÔºàÂèØ‰ΩøÁî®‰ª•‰∏ãSQLÂàõÂª∫Ôºâ:

sqlCREATE TABLE job_listings (
  id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  job_title TEXT NOT NULL,
  application_url TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  industry TEXT,
  flexibility TEXT,
  salary_range TEXT,
  status TEXT,
  source TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  processed_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE,
  reason_for_match TEXT
);
